Introduction

VARSITY was a South Korean-Chinese twelve-member boy group originally formed under In Hi Media Ltd., in collaboration with GKC Entertainment, and was ultimately managed by Jungle Entertainment. Seven of the members were Korean, while five were Chinese. Only the seven Korean members were to promote in Korea, while the five Chinese members were to promote as a sub-unit in China.

The group debuted on January 5, 2017 with the digital single "Round One". After 3 years of promotions, the group disbanded in April 2020. They released the digital single "We'll Meet Again" as a farewell to fans.
